long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
XssKick â€“ Extra Features

XssKick is a plugin developed for the Kick.com streaming platform. This plugin allows you to use extra features for kick.com.

Features:

-Chat Window Customization: Allows users to move the chat window to the left or right, personalizing the screen layout.

-Emoji Conversion: Converts text-based emojis used in chats during streams into graphic emojis.

-Automatic theater mode

-By adding alarms for the words you specify in the chat, it will alert you audibly and visually when those words are mentioned.

-Option to hide fields like top donor at the top of the chat

-The duration of the timeout button in Chat is 5 minutes by default. You can change this time as you wish.

-You can automatically set the broadcast quality to high or low.

-Automatically ban/timeout banned words and banned usernames from chat

-*New* Receive notifications for following and unfollowing people (Only on channels you are authorized for)

-*New* Stop the chat by pressing Alt key.

-*New* Video controls - 5 or 10 seconds forward or backward, video speed up or slow down

-*New* Chat Font and Font Size Change

-*New* Customizable and draggable chat in Full Screen

-*New* Sound stabilizer(Experimental)

-*New* Badge Concealer

-*New* Quick Message Buttons

Known problems;
When the page changes, there may be a problem if the chat is on the left side. It is enough to refresh the page.

As a result of Kick's interface update, Emoji changer and quality options are disabled. They will be restored as soon as possible.

XssKick is designed to make your streaming experience more fun and personalized. Enhance your chats on the Kick.com platform now!

Continuously being developed. Please feel free to share your suggestions and feedback :)
